message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a new owner to reassign this case(s) to, or else choose Auto Reassign.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USERNAME_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please indicate only one option. Reassign to a new owner, or perform an auto reassign.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USERNAME_AND_AUTOREASSIGN_SELECTION
message.locale: Please indicate only one option. Reassign to a new owner, or perform an auto reassign.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_CASESTATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: Case Reference No (%1s) is closed and cannot be reassigned.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USER_INACTIVE
message.locale: User %1s is not an active user, and cases cannot be reassigned to this user.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_CASE_EMPTY
message.locale: No case has been selected for reassignment.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USERROLE_EMPTY
message.locale: User (%1s) does not have a role on case (%2s), so reassignment cannot be done.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_UNSUBSCRIBE_USER_FROM_WORKQUEUE_NO_SENSITIVITY_LEVEL
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate sensitivity level to unsubscribe users from this work queue.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_UNSUBSCRIBE_USER_FROM_WORKQUEUE_NO_PRIVILEGES
message.locale: Only the work queue administrator can unsubscribe users to this work queue.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_UNSUBSCRIBE_USER_FROM_WORKQUEUE_NOTIFICATION
message.locale: You have been un-subscribed from (%1s) work queue by (%2s).

message.name: SUPERVISOR_RESERVE_WORKQUEUE_TASKS_FOR_USER_SENSITIVITY_MISMATCH
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate sensitivity level to reserve tasks from this work queue.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_RESERVE_WORKQUEUE_TASKS_FOR_USER_NO_ALLOW_SUBSCRIPTION_INDICATOR
message.locale: Only the work queue administrator and the users subscribed to this work queue, can reserve tasks from this work queue.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REALLOCATE_TASKS_SELECTION_EMPTY
message.locale: You have not selected any tasks to reallocate.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_SELECTED_TASK_MUST_BE_RESERVED_BY_USER
message.locale: The task, %1s, is no longer reserved by this user and cannot be reallocated.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_SELECTED_TASK_MUST_NOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: The task, %1s, is closed and cannot be reallocated.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_USERTASKS_SELECTION_EMPTY
message.locale: You must select a party to forward a task, or tasks to.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_USERTASKS_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please select only one party to forward a task, or tasks to.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_USERTASKS_NO_TASK_SELECTED
message.locale: You have not selected any tasks to forward.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_USERTASKS_NOT_RESERVED
message.locale: The task, %1n, is no longer reserved by this user and cannot be forwarded.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_USERTASKS_CLOSED
message.locale: The task, %1n, is closed and cannot be forwarded.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_TASK_ALLOCATION_BLOCKED_FOR_USER
message.locale: The task(s) cannot be forwarded because the user is currently being blocked from the allocation of new tasks.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_SUBSCRIBE_SUPERVISOR_SENSITIVITY_CHECK
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate sensitivity level to subscribe users to this work queue.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_ALLOCATION_BLOCK_START_DATE_TIME_CHECK
message.locale: Please select a start date and time that is in the future.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_ALLOCATION_BLOCK_START_DATE_TIME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Please select a start date and time.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_ALLOCATION_BLOCK_END_DATE_TIME_CHECK
message.locale: End date and time must be later than the start date and time.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_ALLOCATION_BLOCK_NO_OVERLAP_CHECK
message.locale: New task allocation block records cannot overlap with current or pending task allocation blocks. Please enter a new time period that does not overlap with another task allocation block record.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_ALLOCATION_BLOCK_NO_OVERLAP_WITH_TASK_REDIRECTION_CHECK
message.locale: New task allocation block records cannot overlap with current or pending redirections. Please enter a new time period that does not overlap with a task redirection record.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USER_CANCELED
message.locale: The user (%1s) is cancelled and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USER_CLOSED
message.locale: The user (%1s) is closed and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_ORGANIZATIONUNIT_CANCELLED
message.locale: The organization unit (%1s) is closed and cannot be assigned as owner.
The organisation unit (%1s) is closed and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_POSITION_CANCELLED
message.locale: The position (%1s) is closed and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: INF_TASK_RESERVED_TO_USER
message.locale: Task %1n has been reserved to the user.

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_USER_WORKSPACE_NO_TASKS_DUE
message.locale: No tasks have a due date that falls within the time period selected.
